title: My pixel 2 xl suddently wen't black and won't turn on
content:
My phone screen just wen't black after opening whatsapp. It seems that it shuts down by itself, because i got no response from my phone at all. 
Now it won't turn back on again while i charge using laptop or any adapter. I also try to change the cable. 
Already tried to press the power and volume and still no luck. 

Please help as I did nothing with my phone and update to the latest patch.
